source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: One Stroke Painting : Creative Tips and Tricks
items.headline: One stroke painting
objectives_summary: What is one stroke painting?
How to load a brush with paint?
What is the basic proportion to load our brush?

items.title: Chinese painting / Sumie course  : painting Chrysanthemum
items.headline: Chrysanthemum painting lesson from Beginner to Advanced with english subtitle
objectives_summary: Learn every technique of painting different Chrysanthemum
freehand style
Learn composition

items.title: How to Make Homemade Melt and Pour Soap
items.headline: Soap making with Melt and Pour Technique
objectives_summary: Main features of the melt and pour technique
Differences between Melt and Pour and Cold Process Method
Soap bases from the chemical point of view, main ingredients and structures

items.title: Beautiful Beaded Bracelets - Jewelry Making for Beginners
items.headline: Handcraft intricate beaded bracelets using a rare skill of jewelry making, ideal for beginners (no needle, no wire)
objectives_summary: How to handcraft 3 gorgeous & elegant beaded bracelets using a jewelry making technique SIMPLE enough for an 8 year-old to learn, yet UNIQUE enough to be part of Croatian traditional artisan jewelry handcrafting process, officially declared as INTANGIBLE CULTURAL HERITAGE of Croatia!

items.title: Painting snowy mountains in watercolour
items.headline: Learn how to paint mountains seen from skiing area, create volume on snow and use the tone for creating contrasts.
objectives_summary: watercolour painting
different type of watercolour washes
dry-brush technique

items.title: Watercolour flowers. Eustoma in watercolour.
items.headline: How to paint eustoma flowers with watercolour?
objectives_summary: To paint eustoma flowers using different watercolour techniques.
To use watercolour techniques, sketches, understanding composition in that painting and in the future.
To paint your own piece of art.

items.title: Wire Wrapping : Jewelry Making for Beginners, Tulip Pendant
items.headline: Learn to Create Beautiful and Unique Jewellery with Wire Wrapping Techniques..Create Wire Wrap Tulip Pendant
objectives_summary: This course will teach you to create this beautiful pendant. You will weave, sculpt and transform the wire to create jewelry.
Learn various 'wire weaving techniques' which can then be used to create your own jewelry pieces.
At the end of the course, you will be able to create beautiful The Tulip Pendant.

items.title: Simple Miniature Art For Beginners
items.headline: make your artwork fit into the palm of your hand
objectives_summary: creating miniature art
what tools and materials to use for miniature art
six ideas for miniature paintings

items.title: Learn color relativity to be a more effective painter
items.headline: Part 3 of "Rigorous Color System for Artists"
objectives_summary: How to deal with the relativeness of color in painting

objectives_summary: How to paint a gouache still life with a pictorial style

visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.name: Robert

items.headline: Learn To Paint Stunning Waterfalls, Seas, Rough Surf, Quiet Ponds And More...
objectives_summary: You will learn to paint still ponds and reflections
You will learn to paint rough seas and surf
You will learn to paint simple waterfalls

items.title: Paint in Ink on Paper for Beginners by International Artist

visible_instructors.job_title: International Artist & the Founder of two National Brands.
visible_instructors.name: Katrina
visible_instructors.title: Katrina Read

items.headline: Learn fundamentals I Paint with Ink on Paper I  with Award winning International Artist and Brand Founder, Katrina Read.
objectives_summary: Learn tips and tricks to paint with ink on paper, and work towards painting botanicals from International artist, and the creator of two brands, Katrina Read.
This course starts with the basics fundamentals of painting and applies it through guided tasks using ink on paper. You will gain access to support downloads.
Gain confidence to then apply the tips and tricks you have learnt to start to paint botanical elements and understand composition, light, gradients and colour.

items.title: MASTER PORTRAIT DRAWING COURSE

objectives_summary: Drawing with Charcoal
Pencil Drawing
Portrait Drawing

items.title: Snow Landscapes: Make 9 Watercolor Greeting Cards
items.headline: Have fun creating 9 Watercolor Greeting Cards with simple materials!
objectives_summary: How to Paint 9 holiday themed snow scenes (9 different projects)
How to create unique card with simple materials
How to fold your card professionally using a special trick

items.title: EASY TULIPS PAINTING
items.headline: We will draw a lovely Tulips in Watercolor Painting step by step, get acquainted with the simple watercolor techniques

items.headline: Watercolors with Mindfulness
objectives_summary: Unleash your creativity and get comfortable using watercolors without feeling intimidated.
Learn to release stress with holistic combination of simple guided meditation and art.
Paint: Abstract/Mandala, Pebbles, Water Reflection, Flowers
